


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isBase64 ```


Check if the passed value is a base 64 string

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isBase64 from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/base64'
if (isBase64(true) {
  // do something
}
```
